content.title: Calvary Kids Links
content.heading: Links for Kids
content.p:
Kids, you can explore, have fun, and grow in your relationship with Jesus through these Christian Internet sites. Please remember to honor and obey your parents by NEVER using the computer or the Internet without getting their permission first!
Kids Need Him - Gospel presentation for kids Keys for Kids - Daily online devotional for kids
Kids Corner - Bible stories, memory verses, and coloring pictures
Even a Child... - Games, Creation Kid Club, sharing the Good News, and more!
Rod Lightning - Join Rod in his time travel adventures through Bible times
Wonderzone - Activities, adventures, and the chance to travel the world learning more about God as a Wonder Agent!
Online Coloring Books from Calvary Chapel South Bay: Epic Events of the Bible Jesus' Ministry Old Testament Characters
